title: Tier List Update Special
author: Chris Taylor
description:
We have now been recording for more than 50 episodes! With that many episodes and many more to come there were bound to be oddities in our rankings – as you can definitely see in our old ranking list – we have established certain zones into which Pokemon would get dumped into and many times unfairly. We thus bring you this special 1 hour long episode where we reconsider some of our favorites and shake things up a bit. Things get heated and someone gets a bit salty about it.

When Mankey gets upset he rages. When he rages, his pals get upset too and they rage. What does this mean for you? A broken face. Stay out of the forest.

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw) [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), Chris

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.
